title: Update libwebp to latest version
body:
## Background

Originally reported in #3055 (now closed, split into separate issues).

<sup>Originally posted by **jeremy-bridges** November 5, 2024</sup>

Many vulnerabilities are flagged by Black Duck for libwebp. Please update to reduce the security vulnerability profile of SkiaSharp.

![libwebp vulnerabilities](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/063fceb6-d0d0-4e53-81e1-7d256f594102)

## Current Status

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| Current version | 1.3.2 |
| Target version | 1.6.0 |
| PR | #3461 |

## Changes in libwebp 1.4.0 - 1.6.0

- Security hardening and increased fuzzing coverage
- Additional AVX2, SSE2 optimizations (AVX2 disabled for now, see #3464)
- Fix heap overflow in webpmux
- Lossless encoder improvements
- Various bug and warning fixes

## Related

- PR #3461 - Update libwebp to 1.6.0
- Issue #3464 - Enable AVX2 optimizations (follow-up)
- Discussion #3053 - Original report
